title: LivsMed completes Korean IPO to accelerate remote robotic surgery
description:
LivsMed has become a South Korean unicorn as it develops surgical robots and laparoscopic instruments.

The post LivsMed completes Korean IPO to accelerate remote robotic surgery appeared first on The Robot Report.
